page.title: 10Population
page.content: {Movement of population.}Whereas people tended in the past to live all their lives in one area, now 42% of the residents in this area have only lived in their present house for 5 years or less, only 14% have lived in the same house for 20 years or more. {Size of families.}Large families are not as common as they were, 32% of families have 2 children, 20% have 3 children, 32% have no children. {Why live in the country?}Most people chose to live in the country because of the pleasant surroundings, peace and quiet and the friendliness. {Transport.}There is a public bus service through Hillesley, with the choice of 3 buses each weekday to Yate and one bus to Wotton-under-Edge on Thursday and Saturday mornings. Half of the people own a car, 20% own two cars and 24% use a firms car.
